message: Hello Bob, I'm excited to offer you this amazing product. I think you'll really love it. I'm willing to sell it to you for $120.
I'm interested in the product, but I was thinking more along the lines of $90. Can you meet me at that price?
I understand you're looking for a good deal, but $90 is a bit low for me. I can meet you halfway at $110. What do you think?
I appreciate your willingness to meet me halfway, but I'm still a bit above my budget. Can you consider $100?
I can see you're really interested in the product, but I'm not willing to sell it to you for $100. I can offer you a slight discount, but I need to make a profit. How about we meet at $115?
I understand you need to make a profit, but I'm still trying to stay within my budget. Can you consider $105?
I appreciate your persistence, Bob! I'm willing to make one more concession. I can offer you the product for $110, but that's as low as I can go. What do you think?
I appreciate your willingness to make a concession, but I'm still a bit above my budget. Can you consider one more time? I'll meet you at $108?
I've already given you a good deal, Bob. I'm not willing to go any lower than $110. If you're not willing to meet me at that price, I'll have to consider other options.
I understand you're firm on the price, but I'm still not comfortable going above my budget. I'll make one final offer: $109. If you're willing to meet me at that price, I'll buy the product from you.
